mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Legacy Questionnaire", "Hall of Fame - Ralph and Eve Maxhimer", "Origin of Today's Calls", "Square Dancemanship", "Area PUblications Directory" and "30th National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Experimental Notes", "Discovery", "The Single Square Dancer", "Advanced Dancing", "Take A Good Look", "Traditional Treasury", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Contra Corner", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
